definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
vulture/(bird species of China) cinereous vulture (Aegypius monachus)
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people
lit. in the presence of a monk, insult another monk, calling him a bald-headed bandit (idiom)/fig. to insult indirectly/to criticize obliquely
pinyin: dui4 zhe5 he2 shang5 ma4 zei2 tu1

definition: lit. to insult a bald man while pointing at a monk (idiom)/fig. to insult indirectly/to criticize obliquely
pinyin: zhi3 zhe5 he2 shang5 ma4 tu1 zi5

definition: name of "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14)/see also 冖[mi4]
(bird species of China) lesser adjutant (Leptoptilos javanicus)

sentences.english: Boulatruelle, with the rapidity of joy, dropped rather than descended from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 蒲辣禿柳兒高興得迅速從樹上連爬帶滾而下。

sentences.english: If he has lost his hair from the front of his scalp and has a bald forehead, he is clean.
sentences.chinese: 他頂前若掉了頭髮，他不過是頂門禿，還是潔淨。
蒲辣禿柳兒想到了財寶。

sentences.english: People often play jokes on him about his baldhead.
sentences.chinese: 人們經常拿他的禿腦袋開玩笑。

sentences.english: The essay seems to start unexpectedly [unsatisfactorily].
Boulatruelle committed the error of not comprehending this.
sentences.chinese: 蒲辣禿柳兒不懂這一點，這是他的錯誤。

sentences.english: "By the deuce," said Boulatruelle, "I'll find him again.
sentences.chinese: “見鬼，”蒲辣禿柳兒想，“我會再找到他的。

sentences.english: The higher the monkey climbs up the tree, the more he exposes the ugliness of his bald red behind.
sentences.chinese: 猴子爬得愈高，尾部又禿又紅的醜相就愈加顯露。

sentences.english: He's getting bald.; He's going baldish.
I don't want to go bald, I'm only twenty-eight.
sentences.chinese: 我不想變禿，我才二十八歲。

sentences.english: This thesis elaborates the studies on the chemical constituents from the leaves of Phellodendron chinense var.
sentences.chinese: 本論文詳細論述了禿葉黃柏葉子化學成分的研究。

sentences.english: He's as bald as a coot .

sentences.chinese: 是老了許多，現在連頭幾乎都禿了。

sentences.english: Alopecia Totalis involves hair loss over the entire scalp.
sentences.chinese: 禿涉及整個頭皮頭髮損失。

sentences.english: Huddled in a wheelchair was an old, balding, emaciated woman.
sentences.chinese: 蜷縮在輪椅上的是一個又老又禿的瘦弱女人。

definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to apply makeup to the eyebrows/(bird species of China) Chinese hwamei (Garrulax canorus)
ability to write/writing skill/written/in written form
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
